snippet: SCHWARTZ--Gladys, on March 18, 2016 at age 93. Born Gretel Weil in Frankfurt, Germany. Beloved wife of the late Werner, devoted mother, grandmother, great- grandmother. Donations to International Myeloma Foundation. Graveside services at 12:30pm at Beth Moses Cemetery, West Babylon, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Gladys, on March 18, 2016 at age 93. Born Gretel Weil in Frankfurt, Germany. Beloved wife of the late Werner, devoted mother, grandmother, great- grandmother.
